snippet: A concentration at the university brings concepts like love and connection to the healing process for therapy clients.
abstract: Columbia University's clinical psychology program is experimenting with integrating psychotherapy and spirituality in ways seldom seen at a major research university; psychology masters' concentration brings concepts like love and connection to the healing process for therapy clients and a broader program, the Spirituality and Mind-Body Institute, will conduct research and host seminars and lectures.
lead_paragraph: A concentration at the university brings concepts like love and connection to the healing process for therapy clients.
